title: Iteration 2 - Enriched Note
description: Object representing an enriched note, featuring a concise summary, key insights, practical examples, defined relationships, and a reference to its original source.

description.description: A detailed and comprehensive explanation of the note's central concept, providing context, multiple facets, and supporting information to enhance understanding.

key_points.description: List of essential key points that concisely summarize the concept.

tags.description: List of tags that categorize the note, providing a quick overview of its content.

practical_examples.description: A list of practical examples that effectively illustrate the concept.
